title: Privacy Policy
introduction: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our app ("the App"). Because the App is currently available only to a small, controlled group of users during early development, its features — and this Privacy Policy — may change over time. Any major updates will be communicated to users.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect the following types of information:

subsections.title: Personal Information
items: Name
Email address
Profile picture

subsections.title: Training Data
items: Training activity details (time, type, notes, date)

subsections.title: Usage Data
items: General app usage analytics
Device and interaction data used to understand feature usage and improve the App

sections.title: How We Store Information
sections.content: Your data is stored securely using Firebase services:

items.title: Firebase Authentication
items.description: stores your email and authentication details

items.title: Firebase Firestore
items.description: stores user account information, training logs, and preferences

sections.footer: All Firebase services comply with industry-standard security and encryption practices.

sections.title: How We Use Information
sections.content: We use your information for the following purposes:
items: To create and manage user accounts
To allow you to track your personal training history
To enable optional sharing of training logs with your coach
To provide and save user preferences
To analyse how the App is being used and improve features

nestedItems.title: To send emails for:
items: Account verification
Referral invitations (when initiated by you)
Optional sharing features (when initiated by you)

sections.footer: We do not use your information for advertising.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except:

items.title: Firebase Authentication
items.description: which processes your email and password to verify your identity.

sections.footer: No other user data is shared or sold to third parties.

sections.title: Data Deletion
paragraphs: You may delete your account and all associated data at any time through the App.
You may also request deletion by contacting us directly.
items: All training history is removed
All personal information is removed
Linked content in Firebase Storage (e.g., profile pictures) is deleted
sections.footer: Data removal is permanent and cannot be recovered.

sections.title: Emails & Communication
sections.content: We use your email address only for:
items: Account verification
Optional sharing with coaches (only when initiated by you)
Referral invitations (only when initiated by you)
sections.footer: We do not send marketing emails.

sections.title: Access Restrictions
paragraphs: The App is currently accessible only to a limited group of users.
Access is granted manually by the administrator during this development phase.

sections.title: Changes to This Policy
paragraphs: Because the App is still under development, this Privacy Policy may change.
If significant updates occur, we will notify users through the App or via email.
